thread.title: Erykah Badu Shows Off Trap Music Prowess With Playlist For 2 Chainz
thread.title_full: Erykah Badu Shows Off Trap Music Prowess With Playlist For 2 Chainz

author: Kyle Eustice
title: Erykah Badu Shows Off Trap Music Prowess With Playlist For 2 Chainz
text:
0 
Despite the fact 45-year-old Erykah Badu came up during Hip Hop’s golden era, the Dallas native clearly keeps a close ear to the street and has a firm grasp on what the kids are listening to these days. Ahead of the release of 2 Chainz’s next mixtape, Pretty Girls Like Trap Music , the colorful rapper has been enlisting various extraordinary female artists to craft playlists in his honor and Ms. Badu is up next, following one from Karrueche. 
The “trap&b” singer and self-proclaimed “unicorn,” who had plenty of trap notes on her 2015 offering, But You Caint Use My Phone , has curated a playlist for the Georgia kingpin, which includes music from artists such as Lil Yachty, Divine Council, Future, Mike WiLL Made-It , Young Thug, her baby daddy André 3000 (“Decemba” remix), the East Atlanta Santa — Gucci Mane — and of course, 2 Chainz. Badu throws in a couple of her tracks for good measure, including the contagious “Phone Down” and “I’ll Call U Back.” Running over an hour in length, the 24-track mix is a decent cross-section of rap’s current climate that just happens to be thrown together by one of Hip Hop’s most beloved goddesses. Bump it above.
